stories.text: I see Jerry is Hiring posts pop up what feels like multiple times a week and rarely see these posts from other YC companies. I wonder if others notice this and feel their posting too often or if I'm just over sensitive to it...
stories.title: Ask HN: Does it feel like Jerry is abusing posting privileges?

stories.text:
What's the best free SEO checkup analyzer tool available lately? Preferably an online tool (rather than CLI/desktop) but I would appreciate any suggestions.

I've tried several and either they just don't work (stuck processing) or they just end up spamming you with endless upgrade prompts in order to get anything meaningful/useful out of it.

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Best free SEO checkup analyzer tool?
